members.joinCircumstances: Founder and leader of the Krieg Pirates
Second-in-command and most loyal subordinate of Don Krieg
Shield defender and commander in the Krieg Pirates

keyMoments.title: Internal Conflict in Krieg Pirates
keyMoments.description: Gin defies Don Krieg's direct order for the first time, revealing cracks in the crew's unity.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even the most disciplined crews can fracture when loyalty conflicts with honor.

keyMoments.title: Krieg Deploys MH5 Against Everyone
keyMoments.description: Don Krieg uses the MH5 poison gas, willing to sacrifice his own crew members in pursuit of victory.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Krieg's ruthless leadership philosophy and lack of care for his subordinates.

keyMoments.title: Krieg Betrays Gin
keyMoments.description: Krieg forces Gin to discard his gas mask, effectively sentencing his most loyal subordinate to death.
keyMoments.significance: The ultimate betrayal that shows Krieg values obedience over loyalty and will kill anyone who disobeys.

ships.description: Don Krieg's flagship, though heavily damaged after encounter with Mihawk

jollyRoger.description: An hourglass symbol representing the fleeting nature of life for Krieg's enemies
